string-array.item: ALTER TABLE `domains` ADD COLUMN `domain` VARCHAR(32); UPDATE `domains` SET `domain` = SUBSTR(`domainname`, INSTR(`domainname`, \'.\')+1);
CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS `samplesets` AS SELECT `synsetid`, GROUP_CONCAT(`samples`.`sample`, \'|\' ) AS `sampleset` FROM `samples` GROUP BY `synsetid`;
